name: Mirage (itch)
description:
Find your way through a mysterious alien landscape while juggling between the real world and a shadowy underworld that is almost a perfect reflection with subtle and dangerous differences. Created in two weeks for #gamedevjongamejam

Controls Keyboard

Arrow keys / WASD: Movement

Space bar: Jump / Skip dialogue

R: Reset

Escape / P: Pause game

Gamepad

Left Joystick / D-pad: Movement

A button: Jump / Skip dialogue

Y Button: Reset

Start: Pause game
